TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebMessageEncodingBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class WebMessageEncodingBindingElement Inherits MessageEncodingBindingElement Implements IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 啟用在用於 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 繫結時，要讀取與寫入的純文字 XML、JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 訊息編碼和「未經處理」二進位內容。

span.span: Enables plain-text XML, JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) message encodings and "raw" binary content to be read and written when used in a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將訊息轉換成位元組序列的處理序，Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是相反的處理序。Decoding is the reverse process. 這些處理序需要字元編碼的規格。These processes require the specification of a character encoding. 的運作方式是委派給一系列的內部編碼器，以處理純文字 XML 和 JSON 編碼以及「原始」二進位資料。The works by delegating to a series of inner encoders to handle the plain-text XML and JSON encodings, and "raw" binary data. 這項委派是由複合訊息編碼器所完成。This delegation is done by a composite message encoder. 在不使用由 所使用之 SOAP 傳訊的案例中，會使用這個繫結項目及其複合編碼器來控制其編碼方式。This binding element and its composite encoder are used to control the encoding in scenarios that do not use SOAP messaging used by the . 這些案例包括 "Plain Old XML" (POX)、代表性狀態傳輸 (Representational State Transfer，REST)、Really Simple Syndication (RSS) 和 Atom 新聞訂閱，以及 Asynchronous JavaScript 與 XML (AJAX)。These scenarios include "Plain Old XML" (POX), Representational State Transfer (REST), Really Simple Syndication (RSS) and Atom syndication, and Asynchronous JavaScript and XML (AJAX). 複合訊息編碼器不支援 SOAP 或 WS-Addressing，因此 一定會傳回 。The composite message encoder does not support SOAP or WS-Addressing, and so always returns . 在建構階段可使用 建構函式，以寫入字元編碼設定此繫結項目。The binding element can be configured with a write character encoding at construction time using the constructor. 值會指定 JSON 和 Textual XML 案例在寫入時的行為。The value specifies the behavior on write for the JSON and Textual XML cases. 在讀取時，任何有效的訊息編碼和文字編碼都是可解讀的。On read, any valid message encoding and text encoding is understood. 這個建構函式會設定配置到集區，以及分別可用來處理傳入和傳出訊息 (在不配置新的讀取器或寫入器的情況下) 之讀取器及寫入器數目上限的預設值。This constructor sets default values on the maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that are respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers or writers. 和 等屬性也可以用於設定要分別配置之讀取器和寫入器的最大數目。The properties and can also be used to set the maximum number of readers and writers to be allocated respectively. 根據預設，將配置 64 個讀取器和 16 個寫入器。By default 64 readers and 16 writers are allocated. 預設複雜度條件約束也是由位於與此編碼相關之 上的建構函式使用 屬性設定，以防止阻絕服務 (DOS) 類別攻擊試圖使用訊息複雜度困住端點處理資源。Default complexity constraints are also set by this constructor on the associated with this encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 具有 方法，它會根據指定的內容型別，適當建立會產生 JSON、XML 或原始格式等訊息解碼器和編碼器的訊息編碼器處理站。The has a method that creates a message encoder factory that produces JSON, XML or Raw message decoders and encoders as appropriate depending on the content type specified. 也會提供方法，為 HTTP 要求所流經的通道建置處理站和接聽程式。The also provides the methods to build the factories and listeners for the channels through which the HTTP requests flow. 複合編碼器及其相關的類別和組態元件可在部分信任環境中使用，而且在使用上不需要任何特殊權限。The composite encoder and its associated classes and configuration components are usable in partial trust and this use does not require any special permissions.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會使用 做為預設的字元編碼。This constructor uses as the default character encoding. 因此，當您需要這個字元編碼時，請使用這個建構函式。So use this constructor when you want this character encoding. 如果您需要另一個字元編碼，請使用 建構函式。If you want another character encoding, use the constructor. 這個建構函式會設定配置到集區，以及分別可用來處理傳入和傳出訊息 (在不配置新的讀取器或寫入器的情況下) 之讀取器及寫入器數目上限的預設值。This constructor sets default values on the maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that are respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers or writers. 根據預設，會為 屬性配置 64 個讀取器，而為 屬性配置 16 個寫入器。There are 64 readers allocated by default for the property and there are 16 writers allocated by default for the property. 預設複雜度條件約束也是由位於與此訊息編碼相關之 上的建構函式使用 屬性設定，以防止阻絕服務 (DOS) 類別攻擊試圖使用訊息複雜度困住端點處理資源。Default complexity constraints are also set by this constructor on the associated with this message encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值 (以位元組為單位) 的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

summary.span: 使用指定的寫入字元編碼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified write character encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的訊息文字編碼有 UTF-8、Unicode 和 Big-Endian Unicode。The message text encodings supported are UTF-8, Unicode, and Big-Endian Unicode. 如果指定其他文字編碼，則會擲回 。If another text encoding is specified, an is thrown. 這個建構函式會設定配置到集區，以及分別可用來處理傳入和傳出訊息 (在不配置新的讀取器或寫入器的情況下) 之讀取器及寫入器數目上限的預設值。This constructor sets default values on the maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that are respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers or writers. 根據預設，會為 屬性配置 64 個讀取器，而為 屬性配置 16 個寫入器。There are 64 readers allocated by default for the property and there are 16 writers allocated by default for the property. 預設複雜度條件約束也是由位於與此訊息編碼相關之 上的建構函式使用 屬性設定，以防止阻絕服務 (DOS) 類別攻擊試圖使用訊息複雜度困住端點處理資源。Default complexity constraints are also set by this constructor on the associated with this message encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值 (以位元組為單位) 的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values (in bytes) are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是支援的訊息文字編碼。

span.span: is not a supported message text encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 新建一個從目前 物件初始化的這類物件。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 屬性值與目前項目相等的 物件。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會建立目前繫結項目物件樹狀結構的完整複本 (也稱為深層複製)。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 這個動作稱為複製整個物件圖形。This is called copying the entire object graph. 傳回深層複製可讓執行階段支援多個自訂繫結共用自訂繫結項目的情況。Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果沒有傳回深層複製，則表示執行階段行為尚未定義。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory CreateMessageEncoderFactory() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateMessageEncoderFactory () As MessageEncoderFactory

summary.span: 建立訊息編碼器處理站，此處理站會產生可以寫入 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 或 XML 訊息的訊息編碼器。

span.span: Creates a message encoder factory that produces message encoders that can write either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML messages.

returns.span: 編碼 JSON、XML 或「原始」二進位訊息的 。

span.span: The that encodes JSON, XML or "raw" binary messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的值會決定用於寫入訊息的字元編碼。The value of the property determines the character encoding used to write the message. 配置到集區以及分別可用來處理傳入和傳出訊息 (在不配置新的讀取器的情況下) 的讀取器和寫入器的數目上限，是由 和 屬性所指定。The maximum number of readers and writers that are allocated to pools and that is respectively available to process incoming and outgoing messages without allocating new readers are specified by the and properties. 由 產生之訊息編碼器所使用的預設複雜度條件約束，可使用 屬性從與此編碼有關聯的 取得，以防止阻絕服務 (DOS) 類別攻擊試圖使用訊息複雜度困住端點處理資源。The default complexity constraints that are used by the message encoders produced by the can be obtained from the associated with this encoding by the property to protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個覆寫會將一個屬性新增至基底 實作：當 `T` 為 ，並傳回 屬性時。This override adds one property to the base implementation: when `T` is , the property is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxReadPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定配置到集區的讀取器數目上限，以及可在不配置新讀取器的狀況下處理傳入訊息的讀取器數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of readers that is allocated to a pool and that is available to process incoming messages without allocating new readers.

value.span: 可處理傳入訊息的讀取器數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of readers available to process incoming messages.

value.span: 預設值為每個型別 64 個讀取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers of each type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加這個數字會增加記憶體消耗量，但是可讓編碼器做好處理傳入訊息量突然暴增的準備，因為編碼器可以使用集區中已經建立的讀取器，而不必建立新的讀取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool that are already created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWritePoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定配置到集區的寫入器數目上限，以及可在不配置新寫入器的狀況下處理傳出訊息的寫入器數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of writers that is allocated to a pool and that is available to process outgoing messages without allocating new writers.

value.span: 可處理傳出訊息的寫入器數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of writers available to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 預設值為每個型別 16 個讀取器。

span.span: The default is 16 writers of each type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加這個數字會增加記憶體消耗量，但是可讓編碼器做好處理傳出訊息量突然暴增的準備，因為編碼器可以使用集區中已經建立的寫入器，而不必建立新的寫入器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that are already created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.
